title: DART Meadow — Home
desc: DART Meadow — the official hub for aerospace innovation, deep-scale research, and neural technology. Explore projects, media, and mission updates.

title: DART Meadow — Projects
desc: Browse all active and archived DART Meadow aerospace and technology projects. Innovation at the edge of science and culture.

title: DART Meadow — Media & Press
desc: Media gallery, press kits, and visual archives from DART Meadow Aerospace. Photography, video, and editorial content.

title: DART Meadow — About
desc: The story behind DART Meadow Aerospace. Mission, vision, team, and the philosophy driving innovation across disciplines.

title: DART Meadow — Contact
desc: Get in touch with the DART Meadow Aerospace team. Partnerships, press inquiries, and collaboration opportunities.

title: Radical Deep Scale — Home
desc: Radical Deep Scale is a research-driven technology initiative exploring deep systems, machine learning, and scalable infrastructure at the frontier of human knowledge.

title: Radical Deep Scale — Research
desc: Published research, whitepapers, and experiments from Radical Deep Scale. Covering AI, neural networks, distributed systems, and deep science.

title: Radical Deep Scale — Blog
desc: Deep-dive articles, essays, and technical posts from the Radical Deep Scale team. Think at scale.

title: Dry Meadow — Home
desc: Dry Meadow — an independent creative and experimental platform. Art, sound, structure, and experiments at the intersection of nature and technology.

title: Dry Meadow — Works
desc: Portfolio of works from Dry Meadow: installation art, digital experiments, sound design, and visual media projects.

title: Dry Meadow — Journal
desc: Field notes and journal entries from Dry Meadow. Essays on creativity, environment, process, and the natural world.

title: NASA Official Website
desc: National Aeronautics and Space Administration. Missions, research, space exploration, climate data, and the future of human spaceflight.

title: SpaceX — Launches & Missions
desc: SpaceX designs, manufactures, and launches advanced rockets and spacecraft. Falcon 9, Starship, Dragon capsule, and Starlink satellite network.

title: ESA — European Space Agency
desc: The European Space Agency explores the universe through science and technology. Satellites, astronauts, earth observation, and interplanetary missions.

title: Blue Origin
desc: Blue Origin builds rockets and spacecraft to enable a future where millions of people live and work in space. New Shepard and New Glenn launch vehicles.

title: NASA Jet Propulsion Laboratory
desc: JPL is a research and development center managing robotic space and earth-science missions, including Mars rovers, Voyager, and deep-space probes.

title: Space.com — Space News & Exploration
desc: The latest space news, launches, astronomy, astrophysics, and exploration updates. Covers NASA, SpaceX, private space industry, and the cosmos.

title: Spaceflight Now — Launch Schedule
desc: Up-to-date launch schedules, mission reports, and spaceflight news from around the world. Covers orbital launches, ISS, and commercial spaceflight.

title: Artificial Intelligence — Wikipedia
desc: Comprehensive overview of artificial intelligence: history, approaches, machine learning, deep learning, natural language processing, and applications.

title: OpenAI
desc: OpenAI builds safe and beneficial AI. Home of ChatGPT, GPT-4, DALL-E, Sora, Whisper, and the o-series reasoning models.

title: Anthropic — AI Safety Research
desc: Anthropic is an AI safety company building reliable, interpretable, and steerable AI systems. Creator of Claude, the AI assistant.

title: Google DeepMind
desc: Google DeepMind conducts cutting-edge AI research. Creator of AlphaGo, AlphaFold, Gemini, and Gemma. Advancing science through AI.

title: Hugging Face — Open ML Models
desc: The platform for open-source machine learning. Thousands of models, datasets, and demos. Build and share AI models for free.

title: Papers With Code — ML Research
desc: Machine learning research with code implementations. Browse state-of-the-art papers, benchmarks, datasets, and code across all ML domains.

title: arXiv — AI & Computer Science Papers
desc: Free open-access archive of AI, machine learning, computer science, physics, and mathematics research papers before peer review.

title: GitHub — Code Repositories
desc: Where the world builds software. Millions of developers host, review, and collaborate on code. CI/CD, Actions, Copilot, and open-source projects.

title: Stack Overflow — Developer Q&A
desc: The largest online community for programmers. Ask and answer programming questions across all languages and frameworks.

title: MDN Web Docs — Web Technology Reference
desc: Comprehensive documentation for HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Web APIs. Reference for all web developers from beginner to expert.

title: The Verge — Technology News
desc: Technology news, product reviews, and culture. Covers consumer tech, AI, science, entertainment, and the intersection of tech and society.

title: Wired — Future of Technology
desc: In-depth reporting on technology, culture, science, and business. How the connected world is being built and who is building it.

title: Hacker News
desc: Social news and discussion for technology, startups, and science. Run by Y Combinator. Daily aggregator of the most interesting tech stories.

title: National Geographic
desc: Exploration, science, adventure, photography, and storytelling. Covers nature, wildlife, history, environment, and human culture.

title: Science.org — Science Magazine
desc: Peer-reviewed research and science news from the American Association for the Advancement of Science. Covers all scientific disciplines.

title: Nature.com — Scientific Research
desc: One of the world's most prestigious science journals. Publishes groundbreaking research across all scientific disciplines.

title: New Scientist — Science News
desc: Weekly science news magazine covering the latest discoveries in physics, biology, space, environment, technology, and human sciences.

title: CERN — Particle Physics
desc: CERN operates the Large Hadron Collider and conducts fundamental research into particle physics. Home of the Higgs boson discovery and the World Wide Web.

title: NASA Climate — Earth Science
desc: NASA Earth science data, climate research, satellite imagery, and visualizations tracking global climate change and environmental systems.

title: Quantum Mechanics — Wikipedia
desc: Quantum mechanics is the fundamental theory describing nature at the smallest scales. Covers wave functions, superposition, entanglement, and uncertainty.

title: Wolfram MathWorld — Mathematics
desc: The world's most extensive mathematics resource. Definitions, theorems, formulas, and interactive visualizations for every branch of mathematics.

title: Physics Forums
desc: Online community for physics discussions. Expert explanations of classical mechanics, relativity, quantum physics, and astrophysics.

title: Khan Academy — Free Education
desc: Free world-class education for everyone. Courses in math, physics, chemistry, biology, computer science, economics, and more.

title: IEEE — Electrical & Electronics Engineers
desc: World's largest technical professional organization. Standards, publications, conferences, and resources for engineers in all technical disciplines.

title: Instructables — DIY Projects
desc: Step-by-step instructions for making all kinds of projects. Electronics, woodworking, 3D printing, robotics, and creative making guides.

title: Hackaday — Hardware Hacking
desc: Daily coverage of hardware hacking, electronics projects, DIY builds, and maker culture. Reverse engineering and creative engineering.

title: Behance — Design Portfolio
desc: The world's largest creative network for showcasing and discovering creative work. Graphic design, UI/UX, photography, illustration, and motion.

title: Dribbble — UI/UX Design
desc: Community of designers sharing interface designs, web design, icon sets, typography, and UI/UX work. Inspiration and hiring platform.

title: Spotify — Music Streaming
desc: Stream millions of songs, podcasts, and audiobooks. Discover new music based on your taste. Available on web, mobile, and desktop.

title: Bandcamp — Independent Music
desc: Discover and support independent artists. Buy music directly from artists and labels. Listen to full albums across every genre.

title: SoundCloud — Audio Platform
desc: Discover and share music, podcasts, and audio tracks. Platform for emerging artists to release original music and reach new audiences.

title: Resident Advisor — Electronic Music
desc: Global electronic music news, reviews, events, artists, and mixes. DJ culture, club events, festivals, and underground music journalism.

title: Discogs — Music Database & Marketplace
desc: The world's largest music database and marketplace. Catalog, buy, and sell vinyl records, CDs, and music memorabilia. Every genre and era.

title: Artsy — Contemporary Art
desc: Discover art from the world's top galleries, museums, and auction houses. Browse millions of artworks for purchase or simply for inspiration.

title: Google Arts & Culture
desc: Explore thousands of artworks in super high definition, virtual museum tours, cultural landmarks, and historical collections from around the world.

title: The Metropolitan Museum of Art
desc: One of the world's largest and most comprehensive art museums. Over 5,000 years of art from every corner of the globe. Free online collection.

title: Pitchfork — Music Criticism
desc: Leading music publication covering the best in independent and alternative music. Reviews, news, best-of lists, interviews, and music videos.

title: Reuters — Breaking World News
desc: International news agency providing trustworthy breaking news, business, financial, and political reporting from around the world.

title: Associated Press
desc: Independent global news network since 1846. Factual, impartial reporting on world events, politics, science, sports, and business.

title: BBC News
desc: BBC World News: comprehensive, trusted coverage of world events, science, politics, culture, sports, and technology.

title: Al Jazeera English
desc: International news and investigative journalism. Covers global events with a focus on underrepresented regions, human rights, and conflict reporting.

title: WHO — World Health Organization
desc: Directing and coordinating authority on international public health. Disease outbreaks, global health guidelines, research, and health policy.

title: PubMed — Medical Research
desc: Free database of biomedical and life science research from the National Institutes of Health. Millions of peer-reviewed medical papers.

title: WebMD — Medical Information
desc: Trusted health and medical information. Symptoms, conditions, drugs, treatments, and wellness guides reviewed by medical professionals.

title: IPCC — Climate Science Reports
desc: The Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change publishes comprehensive assessments of climate science, impacts, and mitigation strategies.

title: Ars Technica — Technology & Science
desc: In-depth technology journalism, science reporting, and policy analysis. Deep technical coverage of computing, AI, space, and culture.

title: Stanford Encyclopedia of Philosophy
desc: Authoritative reference work on philosophy maintained by Stanford University. Covers metaphysics, ethics, logic, philosophy of mind, and more.

title: Edge.org — Ideas & Science
desc: Conversations with the world's leading scientists and thinkers. Explores the frontiers of human understanding across all disciplines.

title: TED Talks
desc: Ideas worth spreading. Thousands of free talks from the world's most inspiring thinkers on technology, science, design, business, and global issues.

title: Wikipedia — Free Encyclopedia
desc: The world's largest free encyclopedia. Millions of articles on virtually every subject in over 300 languages.

title: Britannica — Online Encyclopedia
desc: Encyclopaedia Britannica: trusted, authoritative articles written by experts. Reference content across science, history, culture, and society.

title: Internet Archive — Wayback Machine
desc: Non-profit digital library with millions of books, movies, software, music, and the Wayback Machine capturing web history since 1996.

title: Wolfram Alpha — Computational Engine
desc: Compute expert-level answers using Wolfram's algorithms and knowledge base. Math, science, data, geography, history, nutrition, and more.

title: Python.org — Official Python Docs
desc: Official home of the Python programming language. Documentation, tutorials, downloads, and the Python Package Index (PyPI).

title: Mozilla Developer Network — JavaScript
desc: Complete JavaScript reference and tutorials. Variables, functions, arrays, objects, promises, DOM manipulation, and ES6+ features.

title: CSS-Tricks — Web Design & CSS
desc: Daily articles about CSS, HTML, JavaScript, and web design. Tutorials, code snippets, guides, and the CSS almanac reference.

title: CodePen — Frontend Playground
desc: Online code editor and community for front-end designers and developers. Build and share HTML, CSS, and JavaScript demos.

title: IMDb — Internet Movie Database
desc: The world's most popular and authoritative source for movie, TV, and celebrity content. Ratings, reviews, trailers, and industry news.

title: Letterboxd — Film Community
desc: Social network for film lovers. Log, rate, and review films. Discover movies through friends and curated lists.

title: Criterion Collection
desc: The Criterion Collection publishes and restores important classic and contemporary films. Curated world cinema with supplements and essays.

title: CoinMarketCap — Crypto Prices
desc: Cryptocurrency prices, market capitalizations, charts, and data. Track Bitcoin, Ethereum, and thousands of altcoins in real time.

title: Yahoo Finance — Market Data
desc: Stock quotes, financial news, portfolio management, and market data. Track equities, ETFs, currencies, and economic indicators.

title: IGN — Video Game News
desc: Video game news, reviews, trailers, previews, and guides for all platforms. PC, PlayStation, Xbox, Nintendo Switch, and mobile gaming.

title: itch.io — Indie Game Platform
desc: Open marketplace for independent game creators. Discover thousands of unique indie games, game jams, game dev tools, and comics.
